_header: Saint Mark the holy gospeller wide went a-land
Subjects: saints’ lives; Mark, saint, life of
_description: Life of St. Mark in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodAsh43.First Lines:
SEyn Marc þe holi gospellare wide wende alondeVorto preche
                    cristendom þoruȝ our lordes sonde …
BodAsh43.Last Lines:
…& for feste of þe letanye þat byuore mayHoli
                    chirche halt ech ȝer a seyn Markes day

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint mark þe holy godspeller wyde wente alondefor to prechy
                    cristindom þorw oure lordes sonde…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…men goþ wit letanye a processioun in eche cherche by
                    woneto preye for þe wedering & mankynne & good hit is to
                    done

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
SEint Mark þe Godspellere wyde wende aboute in londefforte
                    preche cristendom þoruh vr lordes sonde…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…God for þe grete ioye þat lasteþ wiþ outen
                    endeAnd for þe loue of seint Mark graunt vs þider to wende.
                    Amen.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLauMis108.First Lines:
Seint Marc þe holie godspellare wide wende in londefor to
                    prechi cristinedom þoruȝ ore louerdes sonde…
BodLauMis108.Last Lines:
…Bidde we nouþe seint Marc ȝwas liif we halbeȝ i
                    heord to þe endeÞat ore soule mote þoruȝ his Arndingue
                    into heouene i wiende
BodLauMis108.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl,
                        ed.  
             The Early South-English Legendary.
EETS
         o.s. 87 (1887; repr. 1987): 362-3.

BodLauMis463.First Lines:
SEint Mark þe holy gospeller wide went a londefforto preche
                    Cristendom thorwe oure lordes sonde…
BodLauMis463.Last Lines:
…And for þe feste of letanie þat bifore mayHoli
                    chirche halt eche ȝer on Seint Markes day
BodLauMis463.Note: Two columns per page, one full-line, the other half-line.

BodTan17.First Lines:
SEint mark þe holi gospeller wide wente in londeffor to preche
                    cristindom þour oure lordis sonde…
BodTan17.Last Lines:
…And for þe feste of letanye þat be fore mayHoli
                    chirche halt eche ȝer on seint markis day

OxfTri57.First Lines:
Seint Mark þe holy gospellere wyde wente a londeffor to prechy
                    cristendon þorgh oure lordis sonde…
OxfTri57.Last Lines:
…and for þe feste of letanie þat by fore mayholy
                    cherche halt ech ȝer a seint Markes day

CamCCC145.First Lines:
Sein Mark þe holy gospellares wide wende alonefforto prechi
                    cristendom þoru oure louerdes sonde sone…
CamCCC145.Last Lines:
…And for feste of letanie þat biuore mayHoly churche halt
                    eche ȝer a sein markes day

D’Evelyn,  Charlotte,  and  A. J. Mill, eds.

CamMagPep2344.First Lines:
Seint Mark þe holy gospellere wyde wende a londeffor to prechi
                    cristendom þorw oure lordes sonde…
CamMagPep2344.Last Lines:
…And ffor þe ffeste of þe Letanye þat by ffore
                    mayHoly chirche halt eche ȝer on Seint Markes day

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint mark þe godspellere wende wyde in londefor to preche
                    cristendom þorȝ oure lordes sonde…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…& for þe feste of letanye þat is by for
                    mayþat holychurche holt eche ȝere on seint markes day

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEint Marc þe holi gospellare wide wente alondeforto prechi cristendom þorou our lordes sonde…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …& for feste of þe letanie þat bifore maiholi cherche halt eche ȝer a sein Markes dai
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum xxxiii” added to right margin by later hand (f. 64).

BLEge1993.Last Lines: …And vor feste of þe became þat is bifore mayHoli chirche halt ech ȝer at seint markes day

BLHar2277.First Lines: SEint Marc þe holi godspellere wide wende alondefforto prechi cristendom þurf oure louerdes sende…

Lam223.First Lines:
SAynt Marke þe gospelere wel wyde went in londefforto preche
                    cristendome þurȝ oure lordes sonde…
Lam223.Last Lines:
…Saynt Marke dyed in ful stronge peyne as did mony moTo
                    þat ioye þat he is ynne god graunte vs all to go. Amen

TokyoTak54.First Lines:
Seynt Marke þe holy gospellere wide went in londeForto prech
                    cristendom þorgh our lordys sonde…
TokyoTak54.Last Lines:
…And for þe grete letany þat bifore mayHoly chirch
                    holdeth ech ȝere on seint Markis day
